text: hello this bill Cunningham we're talking
from New York City which attracts
creative imagination from all over the
world one of the interesting parts to me
of the fashion is the young men way
ahead of women in discovering or forging
modern style of dress that parallels the
high-tech world very different from
traditional style of men's clothes the
new style of these young men a
pioneering has nothing to do with the
Buck Rogers space-age fantasies of the
past these are all people experimenting
with high-tech fabrics and shapes it's
very very interesting there was one
young man and the fabrics and the ways
of style of dress and even carrying the
Fendi bug bag
miles of planets away from what we
consider traditional style of dress in
Paris in October I saw the same thing
reflected again all in young men
absolutely terrific one young man each
day had a different suit he inserted or
his tailor contrasting fabrics into the
jacket on to the cuffs one cuff only and
one side of the jacket and then made a
matching briefcase lost Saturday at 2:00
a.m. two young artists they proceeded to
set up a pop-up art installation of a
spaceship these kids were telling it as
it is today and I thought there was a
very strong relationship to the young
men who are pioneering a new way of
dressing
you
